entry.title: INTEROPERABILITY
entry.summary: In this context, x-raid has proposed a joint effort to establish a decentralised integration lab. The lab will run CL, Eclair, LDK, LND and Electrum on the latest releases on one box rBOX and master.rc on another box rcBOX. Additionally, ZmnSCPxj mentions that there are other bespoke implementations like Ptarmigan.
